questions.question: What's the original story of Zootopia?

choices.answer: Preys will give shock collars as torture device to predators
the animals are referenced to the Civil Rights.

imageMetadata.resources: The original story is when the preys invented the shock collars to the predators because they still might harm the preys and take over the city with no population of preys.
